title: Amazing August! Lofts Only $1995! Util, Cable/WiFi, Parking Incl.
posting_body: Rent Package: $1,995 and up - select home based on size, location and availability
Rental specials on our select Lofts.
All of our homes have new furnishings and new kitchens with new carpet & flooring.
If you move for August your rent is only $1,995.00 and up monthly.
Call us for a virtual or socially distanced tour today!
Centrally located in the heart of downtown Bellevue, the Pacific Inn Apartments features a fully furnished Loft apartment with new kitchen.
If you are relocating to the area, the Pacific Inn Apartments offers the most affordable apartments in downtown Bellevue.
We are the only all inclusive short term Month to Month rental option in downtown Bellevue.
All inclusive means all utilities, cable, internet, water are included in your monthly rent.
We even throw in free parking in our secured garage with weekly housekeeping.
for more information or to take a virtual or self guided tour.
Please visit our Facebook or Twitter pages for more information as well.
